songs.title: Power & Control (Demo Version 3)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Power and control

[Verse 1]
Give a little, get a lot
That’s just how you are with love
Give a little, get a lot
Yeah, you may be good looking
But you’re not a piece of art

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall

[Post-Chorus 1]
Women and men, we are the same
And so we play the stupid game
Of love and power, virgin, whore
I’ve played it but not anymore

[Verse 2]
Think you’re funny, think you’re smart
Think you’re gonna break my heart
Think you’re funny, think you’re smart
Yeah, you may be good looking
But you’re not a piece of art

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall

[Post-Chorus 2]
Women and men, we are the same
And so we play the stupid game
A human vulnerability
Doesn’t mean that I am weak

[Interlude]
That I am weak, I am weak
I am weak, I am weak, weak
Weak, weak, weak, weak

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall

[Post-Chorus 1]
Women and men, we are the same
But love will always be a game
We give and take a little more
Eternal game of tug and war

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall

[Outro]
I’m gonna make you fall
We give and take a little more
‘Cause all my life I’ve been controlled
You can’t have peace without a war
Without a war, without a war
